tidbits.title: Ancient Wonders
tidbits.description: Egypt is home to iconic ancient wonders like the Pyramids of Giza, the Sphinx, and historic temples along the Nile, showcasing a rich pharaonic history.

tidbits.title: Cradle of Civilization
tidbits.description: Often referred to as the 'Cradle of Civilization,' Egypt has a profound cultural legacy that influenced art, architecture, and writing across centuries.

tidbits.title: Nile River
tidbits.description: The Nile River, the longest in the world, is the lifeblood of Egypt, fostering agriculture, culture, and history along its fertile banks.
